title: Bots in TT and Dom
body:
I'm attempting to tryout the new TT and I've had at least one bot on my team every game. This is the reason I stopped playing TT and Dom several months ago. I'm pretty sure this problem is absurdly rampant. Maybe you guys could call Blizzard and ask for some anti bot software so I and no doubt many others can experience these maps with real live people in non-bot mode.

Just a thought.

replies.body: I've had one game that had 1 bot in it, the other four games IN A ROW all had two bots in it and I had to carry the entire game. I am no longer going to bother with Twisted Treeline anymore. I am tired of wasting time fighting against a team by myself and watching the enemy get fed repeatedly by bots. Alas, I don't really think Riot cares as long as people are continuing to buy their stupid skins and champs with dollars. They are still getting their money for now. Frankly I am not spending another cent on this game until they get rid of bots, I may just quit and move to a different game all together. GG Riot.
just had another TT game with another bot -- what is going on with all the bots in TT since the update?

wow, thanks for this post as I was going to post about the same thing. I've started playing the new TT since the update and really like it but WTF is going on with all the bots on TT and how are they getting in that map so easily.  It's awful  -- RIOT please fix this.  LIke the other poster I'm done playing on TT until you can fix the rampant bot problem which is so obvious to those of us playing.
I just got leavebuster because I refuse to waste my time playing with bots.
That's what I did. I just leave so I don't have to deal with it. Sucks waiting but it's better than playing out a 15-30min game.
If by a few months ago you really mean a year ago, then yes.
